ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Mask
ygData.msgSnippet: Woohoo!  Congrats! Also, please excuse the dumb newbie question, but in the thread about mobs that charm, someone said they put away their weapons and get the
ygData.messageBody:
Woohoo! Congrats!

Also, please excuse the dumb newbie question, but in the thread about mobs
that charm, someone said they put away their weapons and get the mob to
charm them first, figuring they're the least threatening potential pet in
their group. My question is, how do you get the mob to charm you rather
than someone else? Are you just punching away at it, waiting for it to try
the charm spell, before anyone else joins in? Do mobs that charm
consistently cast this at the start of battles?

Thanks
Evulia, bard of 13 songs, Tunare





"Shaun Hopps"
<shaun.hopps@btco To:
nnect.com> <eqbards@egroups.com>
cc:
12/07/2000 09:21 Subject: [eqbards] Mask
PM
Please respond to
eqbards






Just like to share with you all that after 6 hours of being scared witless
in the assassin room I finally got my mask.

Nevody Songweaver,
Bard of the 20th Song,
somewhere on Innoruuk.



Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
